title: Uploading Prospective Player Lists for Qualifiers
As a MLB Club User, I want to see Published Game Reports in ebis
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in to eBIS as Club

Wireframe: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=club_communication
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the WBC club comms screen
custom_expected:
THEN the club Comms screen in ebis will be only be populated with Published Game Reports
AND reports displayed will be limited to those with players in the users org
AND if a BOC User is viewing the widget, they will see all published reports

title: As a MLB Club User, I want to see WBC - Club Comm in ebis
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged into eBis as a club
AND has the appropriate wbc club comm club permission
Wire:  https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=club_communication
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the “WBC - Club Comms” option under the International Left Nav link
custom_expected: THEN the club comm dashboard will load

title: As a BOC Admin User, I want to Publish a Game Report to Clubs
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to a submitted game report
custom_expected:
THEN a BOC Admin will be able to edit to make changes and save
AND there will be a Publish to Clubs button in the header when the report is in Submitted state
AND clicking the Publish to Clubs button will update the Report’s status to Published, trigger a green notification, “Published” and take the user back to the club comm page.

title: As a User, I want to submit a Game Report to BOC for Review
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as Fed Admin
AND viewing a preliminary game report
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the submit to BOC button
custom_expected:
THEN the system will perform a required field check 
AND if the check fails, the system will return a message notfiying the user what fields are missing
AND if the field missing is in a player report modal use the following format
Last, First - Field Name is required”

AND if the check passes, the status of the Game Report will be updated to Submitted and a green notification, “Submitted” will be triggered
AND the Game Report will appear on the BOC’s Club Comm screen with the updated status
AND Fed Admins will not be able to to edit Game Reports with a Status of Submitted
